alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 10:57PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, the Missouri Bootheel, and West Tennessee. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
